content.text0: We started working with HawX with CRM services, then we trusted them with Sportsbook Risk Management, Product Management and Website Management too.
content.text1: As a result, after 1-year of experience with HawX, we started 2021 with great Confidence and had amazing results.

content.text0: HawX changed the ecosystem of our business. What i respect the most is the agility, flexibility and quality of their service; they make long-term plans, are super transparent and professional when discussing results.
content.text1: These are the Key feautures that makes HawX our reliable and stable partner.

content.text0: HawX took CRM in its hands in a very short period of time and the result is more than we expected.
content.text1: Our NGR increased and most surprisingly the retenation rate jumped to 75%.

content.text0: HawX us reliable partner who brings success to the business.
content.text1: Their work delivers our users comfort and a great user experience, which results in an increased number of loyal users who enjoy playing with us.

content.text0: This was great value for us to get the package of services HawX offered.
content.text1: I believe that the power of HawX is the communication strategies they have for every user and the quality of delivering it in the most attractive and user-oriented way.

text0.content: We segment players into different life stages, value tiers and behaviours in order to achieve maximal personalization.

text1.content: Through different cycles of your marketing, (conversion, incubation, OTD (one-time depositor), nursery) you will need to have various approaches toward your customers. We provide a complete granular analysis and user journeys targeting conversion rate and other early life stages optimization.

text0.title: Retention
text0.content: With strong micro-segmentation and high brand loyalty marks, keeping the customers returning to your website will never be hard to maintain. We check every data and plan day-to-day and seasonal campaigns to help them stay with you for a long time. With our help, your customers will be receiving the right offer privately based on their product preferences, value tiers and granular behavioural analysis.

text1.content: The average reactivation rate differs from ~67% to ~80% based on the market.

text2.title: Reactivation
text2.content: We reactivate users under churn and dormant life stages and uncover extraordinary reactivation strategies for your business to start regaining the trust of your long lost customers and making them active again.

text3.content: The average reactivation rate differs from 10% to 20% based on the market.

text4.title: Pre-Churn Control
text4.content: By identifying pre-churn customers, you will avoid costly and time-intensive customer-gaining processes by convincing potentially lost customers to keep playing with you.

text5.content: The average churn rate decreased from ~15% to ~25% based on the market

text6.title: VIP Treatment Optimization
text6.content: You can easily show your highest value tier customers that better offerings may more suitably fulfil their needs. VIP customers will be suggested premium stuff, special benefits or any other offers that will help them stay loyal to your brand.

text7.content: The average VIP Retention Rate differs from ~90% to ~97% based on the market.

text0.content: We organize sending of Campaign SMS messages and for that, we provide the best SMS Provider integration in order to avoid i/o in bandwidth. Apart from that, arranging Email marketing and making it automatized can not be done without Email integration.

No one is perfect. In the iGaming business, incidents coming from users are inevitable. The main focus should be on fixing them in predefined intervals and controlling them. We will automate the Incident Management Process via SLA (Service Level Agreement) Met vs Breach approach and deliver reports on a monthly basis.
When it comes to increasing customers' LTV (LifeTime Value), X-Sell is a key.

text1.content: Our professional CRM team works 24/7 on cross-selling customers from one product to another while providing the best user experience on the market, by following perfect strategy:

text2.title: Test & Learn:
text2.content: Leverage dedicated CRM resource takes a proactive approach toward understanding customer to cross-sell behaviour, expectations and user journeys across product verticals, markets and devices.

text3.title: Customer-centricity:
text3.content: Lead the development of a creative, intuitive and mutually rewarding set of CRM actions. Create experiences that customers love and trust. Take a single customer view and support omnichannel efforts

text4.title: Agile:
text4.content: Deliver fast and often to accelerate learning. Use MVP initiatives that achieve the desired outcomes with minimal dev output and establish a solid feedback loop

text5.title: Data-driven:
text5.content: Use existing analysis to make decisions based on data. Make sure campaigns are measurable and reported on using the agreed measurement framework with DS. Deliver on the Customer Plan targets

text6.content: The average X-Sell rate differs from ~15% to ~50% based on the market.

text0.title: Product UI/UX Design
text0.content: We help you establish transparent human interactions with your digital world and improve your user’s experience by giving them the layouts they find easy and informative, that make navigation way easier and increases engagement.

text1.title: Mobile
text1.content: Nowadays, mobile is a key. You will have a large number of customers accessing you through their mobile devices. We make sure you have what is needed to be responsive all the time, have proper navigation and have decent performance.

text2.title: Web
text2.content: We help you establish transparent human interactions with your digital world and improve your user’s experience by giving them the layouts they find easy and informative, that make navigation way easier and increases engagement.

text0.title: Promotional Landing Pages
text0.content: We suggest custom landing pages and other promotional type designs just for you to target your filtered audience. They will make an easy presentation of your offerings, which will definitely increase engagement rate and, therefore, your performance.

text1.title: Promotional Banners and Sliders
text1.content: User-focused slider designs help you put your clear message on the show. We will be considering what can psychologically impress your audience at the first glance.

text2.title: Email Branding
text2.content: Email branding becomes easy with the help of creative banners and newsletters. You will be delivering designs that make all the difference you need to drive users to the system.

text3.title: Thumbnails
text3.content: We care about the smallest detailed icons and images on your website so you can better symbolize the intention and actions your audience must take.

text0.content: You can visually embody your company’s core promises with our imaginative approach to graphics, colours, typographies, and images. A well-designed brand elevates your appeal in different ways.
A big part of website management is daily-basis updates. We will do ongoing and regular operational updates on the client's website so users will be no more confusion with old data.
The first visible parts of your online gaming website are banners. You might want your users to be able to see them without scrolling. We make sure your banners are in the spotlight and look perfect.
As being mobile-friendly is a must for every website, we’ll be keeping an eye on the usability of your website features for all mobile users.
With the help of our professionals, we make sure you are accessible to your users all the time. We also observe every part of your website technically and seemingly.

The more user-friendly options you offer your customers, the more they’ll be willing to choose your website over others. Based on that, we provide different filtering options on products for your users.
We keep updating the smaller sized images on your website so that nothing is missed unnoticed on your latest news and announcements.
There are many ways we try to know and understand what your users do on your website and use this information to optimize your presence.
We’ll be creating an action plan to indicate the “big picture” and show why and how a certain product can change your business existence through focused tasks.
Having more customers attracted to your business, we will begin taking steps to the next phase of success by using referrals and bigger offers.

As there are products, there will be bugs as well. We keep them visible to your eyes and provide strong strategies for managing them. Obviously, all features of a product will always be tested as well.

You need to determine how products are working for your profit. Our methods help you see if what you are expecting is going to lead you through prosperity or if you should start investing in better areas.
We assess the functionality, reliability and usability of your products while addressing the areas where you can take advantage of the opportunities your competitors are missing.

text0.title: Cash Flow Management
text0.content: Monitor your business performance at a detailed and professional level by receiving automated reports from HawX. The vital information we provide will indicate the statement of your business's health.

text1.title: Income Statement
text1.content: Benefit from the profit and loss (P&L) statement we provide to know about the summarized revenues, costs, and expenses incurred usually during a quarter.

text2.title: Reports by Product Verticals
text2.content: Relied on our obtained data, income statements and balance sheets of different companies can be compared to see the relative proportions of different products.

text0.title: Forecasting
text0.content: Based on Marketing Strategies and Seasonality, we tell you what to expect next. We will gather records, use historical or reach-based methods and create customised statements.

text1.title: Budgeting
text1.content: Considering your monthly earnings, fixed and variable expenses and one-time spending, we create a plan for future spending. The plan will help you with balancing the expenses with the income.

text0.title: Records of Expenses
text0.content: Your financial records help you keep track of expenses, gross margin, and possible debt while comparing your current data with the previous accounting records. Needless to say, you will be able to allocate your budget appropriately.

text1.title: CAPEX Management
text1.content: With our help, a highly precise plan will be created for all the funds which are being invested in your business. This helps you to acquire, maintain, and upgrade the products and other assets.

text2.title: Payroll and Bonus Management
text2.content: We will give you the right numbers when money makes a difference to your human resources and of course, your future revenue.

text0.content: Along with sustained business growth, the bookmaker’s ability to effectively manage risk is the most important factor in determining an operator’s profitability and long-term success.

text1.content: Efficient risk management is dependent upon the points and responsibilities that HawX provides for you:

text2.content: Developing processes for odds compilation, risk management, in-play trading and settlement.

text3.content: Controlling and monitoring all game styles, including Arbitrage, SFM, Strong Opinion, Late Betting, etc.

text4.content: Analyze, define and present the opportunities for state-of-the-art risk management solutions.

text6.content: Guide the implementation of risk-related key projects.

text7.content: Ensure all event and player limits are analyzed and maintained, therefore ensuring a good user experience for the customer without exposing the Partner to unnecessary risk.

text9.content: Pro-actively profiling customers based on wagering behaviours.

text11.content: Deliver periodic reports with a clear action plan for improvement, such as betting patterns, limits, etc.

text12.content: Multi-Device and Account sharing tracking and linking

text0.content: Minimizing bonus cost by more than 20% via detecting bonus hunters.

text1.content: Investigate and classify fraudulent users to avoid high-risk scenarios.

text2.content: IP management per promotion and bonus awarding.

text4.content: Maintain a good and efficient relationship with platform providers and report them in case of any big win.

text5.content: Developing and maintaining the Group Risk Assessment, analysing risks as well as identifying, describing and estimating the risks affecting the business.
